reviews.customers_say: Customers love the dress's color and find it flattering, with one mentioning it frames their apple shape perfectly. The fabric quality is good, and customers find it comfortable, with one noting it's not itchy. While some it's true to size, others mention it runs bigger than usual. The dress receives mixed feedback about its material thickness, with several noting it's thin, and several customers find it slightly see-through. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute - affordable - high quality
items.body: This dress is so cute even for plus size ladies! The fabric is a good material but not too heavy or thick. It is a great dress to smooth rolls and muffin tops. This dress is so comfy for casual wear but classy enough to be for a formal wear. Down fall - the cute little dots really attract lint, so beware ðŸ˜¬ Read more
items.author: Rebecca M.B.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great fit and quality
items.body: Absolutely beautiful dress! It was great quality and I had a lot of compliments on it. Read more
items.author: acar3246

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars I would repurchase
items.body: True to size. The material is thin, so consider undergarments with coverage. I personally love the midi length of the dress and the 3/4 length sleeves. The yellow color looks nice on brown skin! Read more
items.author: Selena Santiago

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful & Comfortable
items.body: I bought this dress for a wedding I was invited to and it was absolutely perfect. I usually wear a 2X but a 3X fit me well. My husband absolutely loved the way the dress fit on me, and said it made me ta-tas look nice. It was lightweight but not too lightweight where I was cold. There was a decent amount of stretch and it was quite flattering even though Iâ€™m a big girl. The fabric was soft and in no way itchy. This is one of the few dresses that Iâ€™ve actually enjoyed wearing and didnâ€™t have to readjust all night. Iâ€™m even going to buy it in more colors for more occasions. Read more
items.author: BSSMSTR

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very impressed
items.body: Fit very well loved it for my beach photos! Fit well and Iâ€™m very large chested. Only complaint is the sleeves werenâ€™t long enough so I had to pull them up to make it look like it was a 3/4 sleeve dress. Flowy and very forgiving! Washed well. Cut is a little low but just used a safety pin. Definitely not sheer and inside slip is as long as the outer material. Read more
items.author: Caitlyn Wilson

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not the right sleeves
items.body: The dress is very nice, looks great on. Only draw back is that it doesn't have long sleeves. This would be great for summer, but not a formal Christmas party in Utah. I will be returning it. Read more
items.author: Ronda Snyder

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well made Dress
items.body: The dresses' design, I believe, can fit anyone's shape and look beautiful. At 5'10 200lbs it did for me. Read more
items.author: Rachel S Pawlik

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Christmas Dress
items.body: This dress was so pretty and fit so well (I am curvy and tall), would consider a slip underneath if wearing in an office setting.. I got one because it was a tad see throughâ€¦ but a black slip solved that issue easily Read more
items.author: Hayley Henderson

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Khaki, Yellow, Burgundy, Burnt Orange, Army Green, Black, Coffee, Dusty Blue, Navy Blue, Emerald Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
